summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4179 for the improvement of the alley in block 15, Interlaken Addition, being the alley as platted in the block between 22nd Avenue North and 24th Avenue North, and between Crescent Drive and Interlaken Place, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49799, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
